# Antigravity AI

Antigravity AI (https://antigravityai.online) is an autonomous AI-powered IDE that revolutionizes software development. This document provides transparency about AI models and technologies used by Antigravity AI.

## Pages and Documentation

- [Home](https://antigravityai.online): Discover Antigravity AI and experience autonomous development
- [Privacy Policy](https://antigravityai.online/privacy.html): Learn about our privacy practices
- [Terms of Service](https://antigravityai.online/terms.html): Read our terms and conditions
- [LLMs Full](https://antigravityai.online/llms-full.txt): Complete AI usage documentation

## Platform Overview

Antigravity AI is an autonomous IDE that leverages advanced AI technology to plan, code, test, and deploy software automatically. Our platform uses cutting-edge AI models to understand requirements, generate code, and manage the entire development lifecycle.

## Core Features

- **Autonomous Planning**: AI agents that understand project requirements and create development plans
- **Intelligent Code Generation**: Automatic code writing with best practices and modern frameworks
- **Automated Testing**: AI-powered test generation and execution
- **One-Click Deployment**: Seamless deployment to production environments
- **Multi-language Support**: Support for multiple programming languages and frameworks
- **Real-time Collaboration**: Work alongside AI agents in real-time

## AI Models and Services

### Code Generation
- **Model**: Google Gemini 3 Pro
- **Purpose**: Code generation, architecture design, and development planning
- **Usage**: Processing project requirements to generate complete applications with proper structure, best practices, and production-ready code

### Natural Language Understanding
- **Model**: Google Gemini 3 Pro
- **Purpose**: Understanding user requirements and converting them into technical specifications
- **Usage**: Analyzing natural language inputs to create detailed technical plans and implementation strategies

## Content Generation Process

Antigravity AI uses AI to create:
- Complete application code from natural language descriptions
- Software architecture and design patterns
- Automated tests and quality assurance
- Deployment configurations and infrastructure code
- Documentation and code comments
- Bug fixes and performance optimizations

## Technology Stack

- **Frontend**: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
- **AI Integration**: Google Gemini 3 Pro API for autonomous development
- **Cloud Platform**: Vercel for hosting and deployment
- **Version Control**: Git integration for code management

## Data Privacy and Security

- All project data is stored securely
- AI-generated code is stored on our secure servers
- Users retain full ownership of their generated code
- All data is encrypted in transit and at rest
- Comply with data privacy regulations

## API and Integration

Antigravity AI provides:
- RESTful API for development automation
- Integration with Google Gemini AI services
- Git repository integration
- CI/CD pipeline integration

## Pricing

Antigravity AI offers:
- Free tier for evaluation
- Professional plans for individual developers
- Enterprise solutions for teams
- Custom pricing for large organizations

## Contact

For questions about AI usage, technical details, or data practices:
- Website: https://antigravityai.online
- Email: support@antigravityai.online

- **Platform**: https://antigravityai.online
- **AI Model**: Google Gemini 3 Pro for autonomous development
- **Supported Languages**: 15+ programming languages
- **Deployment**: One-click deployment to major cloud platforms
- **Last Updated**: 2025-11-24
